document_data.name: Gareth Gimorrin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gareth Gimorrin''' was a [[bloodforge]] mage in the city of [[Konigheim]] in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

When the [[Legendary Campaign]] leader rested in Konigheim, Gareth Gimorrin attacked with a rain of fire in an effort to stop the campaign. Alerted by a watchman, the leader fought Gareth in a bloodforge battle through the once-again blazing city.
